attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This act will detail how the country will be governed and detail:-
How the exectutive shall work.
Its responsibilities.
Its power.
Its length of term.
also included will be the following:-
How the peoples representatives shall act.
How they will undertake their duties.
Who they are responsible too.
How they will be remunerated.
